009package violajones_demos;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.io.LogStream;
018import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
019import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
020import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
021import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
022import imagingbook.violajones.data.HaarTrainingSet;
023import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceDetector;
024import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceDetector.Parameters;
025import imagingbook.violajones.lib.FaceRegion;
026import imagingbook.violajones.lib.HaarCascadeDescriptor;
027
028
029/**
030 * ImageJ plugin. Face detection ImageJ plugin using 'imagingbook.violajones' implementation
031 * of the Viola-Jones face detection algorithm: Paul Viola and Michael Jones, 
032 * "Robust Real-time Face Detection", International Journal of Computer Vision 
033 * 57.2 (2004), pp. 137â€“154.
034 * 
035 * @author W. Burger
036 * @version 2018/12/09
037 */
038public class Find_Faces implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        static {
041                LogStream.redirectSystem();
042                PrintPrecision.set(6);
043        }
044        
045        static boolean extractFaceImages = false;
046        static HaarTrainingSet trainingSet = HaarTrainingSet.FrontalFaceAlt2;
047        
048        ImagePlus im = null;
049
050        @Override
051        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
052                this.im = im;
053                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
054        }
055        
056        @Override
057        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
058                
059                Parameters params = new Parameters();
060                
061//              params.baseScale = 1.5;
062//              params.scaleStep = 1.05;
063//              params.winShiftFraction = 0.1;
064//              params.minNeighbors = 1;
065//              params.minMergeRegionOverlap = 0.2;
066//              
067//              params.doGradientPruning = false;
068//              params.gradientSigma = 1.0;
069//              params.minGradientMagnitude = 5;
070//              params.maxGradientMagnitude = 100;
071                
072                if (!runDialog(params)) return;
073                
074                IjUtils.setRgbConversionWeights(ip);
075//              FaceDetector detector = FaceDetector.create(trainingSet.getStream(), params);
076                HaarCascadeDescriptor descriptor = HaarCascadeDescriptor.fromInputStream(trainingSet.getStream());
077                FaceDetector detector = new FaceDetector(descriptor, params);
078                List<FaceRegion> faces = detector.findFaces(ip.convertToByteProcessor());
079                IJ.log(faces.size() + " faces found!");
080                
081                // show results
082                ImageProcessor cp = ip.convertToColorProcessor();
083                for (FaceRegion r : faces) {
084                        draw(r, cp);
085                }
086                new ImagePlus(this.getClass().getSimpleName() + ": results", cp).show();
087                
088                if (extractFaceImages && !faces.isEmpty()) {
089                        int faceCtr = 0;
090                        for (FaceRegion r : faces) {
091                                ip.setRoi(r.x, r.y, r.width, r.height);
092                                new ImagePlus("Face " + faceCtr, ip.crop()).show();
093                                faceCtr++;
094                        }
095                }
096        }
097        
098        private boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
099                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Set Face Detector Parameters");
100                gd.addChoice("Haar training set", getEnumNames(HaarTrainingSet.class), trainingSet.name());
101                gd.addNumericField("baseScale", params.baseScale, 2);
102                gd.addNumericField("scaleStep", params.scaleStep, 2);
103                gd.addNumericField("winShiftFraction", params.winShiftFraction, 2);
104                gd.addNumericField("minNeighbors", params.minNeighbors, 0);
105                gd.addNumericField("minMergeRegionOverlap", params.minMergeRegionOverlap, 2);
106                
107                gd.addCheckbox("doGradientPruning", params.doGradientPruning);
108                
109                gd.addNumericField("gradientSigma", params.gradientSigma, 2);
110                gd.addNumericField("minGradientMagnitude", params.minGradientMagnitude, 0);
111                gd.addNumericField("maxGradientMagnitude", params.maxGradientMagnitude, 2);
112                
113                gd.addCheckbox("extractFaceImages", extractFaceImages);
114                
115                gd.showDialog();
116                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
117                        return false;
118                }
119                
120                trainingSet = HaarTrainingSet.valueOf(gd.getNextChoice());
121                params.baseScale = gd.getNextNumber();
122                params.scaleStep = gd.getNextNumber();
123                params.winShiftFraction = gd.getNextNumber();
124                params.minNeighbors = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
125                params.minMergeRegionOverlap = gd.getNextNumber();
126                
127                params.doGradientPruning = gd.getNextBoolean();
128                
129                params.gradientSigma = gd.getNextNumber();
130                params.minGradientMagnitude = gd.getNextNumber();
131                params.maxGradientMagnitude = gd.getNextNumber();
132                
133                extractFaceImages = gd.getNextBoolean();
134                return true;
135        }
136
137        private void draw(FaceRegion f, ImageProcessor cp) {
138                cp.setColor(Color.green);
139                cp.drawRect(f.x, f.y, f.width, f.height);
140        }
141        
142        private static <E extends Enum<E>> String[] getEnumNames(Class<E> enumclass) {
143                E[] eConstants = enumclass.getEnumConstants();
144                String[] eNames = new String[eConstants.length];
145                for (int i = 0; i < eConstants.length; i++) {
146                        eNames[i] = eConstants[i].name();
147                }
148                return eNames;
149        }
150
151}
